abstract: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company’s chief executive, will not stand for re-election.
snippet: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company’s chief executive, will not stand for re-election.
lead_paragraph: 6:50 p.m. | Updated with statement about Patti Hart

headline.main: Yahoo Director Who Headed C.E.O. Search Committee to Stand Down

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Evelyn M. Rusli
